name: Trash.bin
description:
The recycle bin got tired on recycling and now he wants to delete everything drom the desktop

Controls:

arrows to move

"S" to shoot(uses 10 files)

"A" to heal(uses 50 files)

"Z" to jump (do not have animation yet)

"X" to slash 

"C" to dash (do not have animation yet)

"X"+up = upperSlash (do not have animation yet)

it also have controller support

Props for official#6169 for being the main character, the Trashcan
